summary: Completed comprehensive testing of Mar de Cortez e-procurement system. Backend APIs are fully functional (100% success rate), but frontend has critical authentication and navigation issues that prevent complete user workflows.

ui_bugs.issue: User sessions not persisting properly - users get redirected to login after successful authentication
React error: SelectItem must have a value prop that is not an empty string
Intermittent webpack compilation errors for '@/pages/proveedor/Productos' import

integration_issues.issue: Login succeeds but session doesn't persist, causing redirect loops
Cannot complete product creation flow due to authentication issues

issues: Marine theme implemented correctly with ocean gradient backgrounds
Professional design with proper spacing and typography

passed_tests: Frontend Landing page loading and navigation
Frontend Dashboard initial loading (when auth works)
action_item_for_main_agent: Fix critical authentication persistence issue in frontend - users cannot maintain logged-in state. Also resolve SelectItem component errors that cause React runtime failures. Backend is fully functional.

success_percentage.frontend: 30% - Landing/auth pages work, but dashboard workflows fail due to session issues
